Should be fine. I'm running an i3 with 6GB of RAM and a Radeon 6750M. Isn't the fastest, but you shouldn't expect that of laptops anyway.
Provided you have Windows, Mac, or Linux for an OS I think you'll be just fine. KSP is a pretty versatile program. Just FYI I think the minimum requirements are posted on the website.
Mine works on a i3, 6GB ram with some or another intel GFX card.. all setting on low.. but it works.. I can test and build stuff before I go home and launch it on my PC
Make sure you minimize the amount of land rendering and number of parts and you should be fine. I'm on a similar computer.
